name: Smeshid
description:
You control a wizard, and have to find a way to the end!


Controls: Arrow keys or WASD to  move around. Spacebar to jump, or double jump by pressing spacebar twice.

Duration: The game takes about 5 minutes to complete, your play-through is greatly appreciated.  There is no wrong way to end each level.

Purpose: This project is a research prototype which is supporting a research question. The game has an auto-updater. So if you are curious how this research project  goes along be sure to check in around the end of the month.

Information gathering: The game has a built-in survey that gets sent to me for further analysis, as well as recorded input. The anonymised data sent has all identifiable information removed.

Information sharing: At the end of the research period, it will take some time to analyse the data. After the analysis is complete, I will share the data.


Stay tuned!
